column2: "There's no point in pretending I'm not scared anymore, at least in front of you. So I'll just say it."
"I'm freaked out about going to a new place alone, so how about joining me?"

"I bet you'll say \"Then don't go\",
right? But I've got to do this. I'm looking for someone, remember?"

"I hope I can count on you, partner.
I'd feel a lot safer with you by my side!"
